changelog:
## What's New in v1.0.66

### Features
- Profile-specific sorting: Movie and Series sort preferences saved per profile

### Improvements
- Circular category navigation in Content Management
- Smoother category scrolling
- Catch-up player optimization
- Enhanced security with improved code obfuscation

### Bug Fixes
- Profile sorting now reloads correctly on switch
- Scrollbar position adjusted in Manage Groups
